20101222024610.000|20101222024612.000|CC1|DOUBLED IN THE LAST FIVE YEARS  
20101222024612.000|20101222024613.000|CC1|AND HALF OF THOSE DEFAULTS ARE  
20101222024613.000|20101222024615.000|CC1|ITS SO-CALLED FOR-PROFIT        
20101222024615.000|20101222024617.000|CC1|COLLEGES, SCHOOLS THAT OPERATE  
20101222024617.000|20101222024618.000|CC1|AS A BUSINESS LIKE THE          
20101222024618.000|20101222024621.000|CC1|UNIVERSITY OF PHOENIX.          
20101222024621.000|20101222024623.000|CC1|THE LARGEST UNIVERSITY IN THE   
20101222024623.000|20101222024624.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20101222024624.000|20101222024625.000|CC1|$3.8 BILLION IN REVENUE IN 2009 
20101222024625.000|20101222024626.000|CC1|AND 86% OF THAT CAME FROM       
20101222024626.000|20101222024628.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT FINANCIAL AID.       
20101222024628.000|20101222024630.000|CC1|SENATE EDUCATION COMMITTEE      
20101222024630.000|20101222024632.000|CC1|CHAIRMAN TOM HARKIN SAID THE    
20101222024632.000|20101222024634.000|CC1|FOR-PROFIT SCHOOLS ARE PUSHING  
20101222024634.000|20101222024636.000|CC1|THE SYSTEM TO THE BREAKING      
20101222024636.000|20101222024637.000|CC1|POINT.                          
20101222024637.000|20101222024639.000|CC1|>> THE FOR-PROFIT SCHOOLS ARE   
20101222024639.000|20101222024640.000|CC1|REALLY INFLATING THIS BUBBLE.   
20101222024640.000|20101222024642.000|CC1|>> NO ONE HERE HAS NOT GONE TO  
20101222024642.000|20101222024643.000|CC1|SCHOOL BECAUSE OF FINANCIAL AID.
20101222024643.000|20101222024645.000|CC1|DON'T YOU BE THE FIRST.
